title: [Supply] upload_to_play_store does not upload changelog
body:
### New Issue Checklist - [x] Updated fastlane to the latest version - [x] I read the [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) - [x] I read [docs.fastlane.tools](https://docs.fastlane.tools) - [x] I searched for [existing GitHub issues](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues) ### Issue Description We've noticed recently our change logs do not get updated with releases. These were working fine at some point in the past. Our build pipeline which runs on Gitlab CI generates release notes for tags information and outputs that into the relevant .txt file `.txt` in eg.`android/fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/changelogs/10303027.txt` The screenshots show our most recent release bundle and release notes are not present on the play store. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37096/124625126-71fedc80-de75-11eb-8674-eb6252627a3a.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37096/124625151-7a571780-de75-11eb-80ba-def63886d966.png) I don't the the core supply code that well, but I can see that the release notes get added to the release in [uploader.rb](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/supply/lib/supply/uploader.rb#L242) after that i don't quite know how they make it to the android publisher service, maybe they don't? I was also wondering if it was caused by our release notes being uploaded only during a promote rather than as part of an aab but haven't been able to test, although it uses the same internals of the uploader from what I can tell so I don't see that being a factor? ##### Command executed ``` upload_to_play_store( track_promote_to: to, track: from, version_code: version_code, skip_upload_metadata: false, skip_upload_images: false, skip_upload_screenshots: false, skip_upload_changelogs: false ) ``` ##### Complete output when running fastlane, including the stack trace and command used 
[10:48:08]: ----------------------------------
[10:48:08]: --- Step: upload_to_play_store ---
[10:48:08]: ----------------------------------
+---------------------------------+-----------------------------+
|                  Summary for supply 2.181.0                   |
+---------------------------------+-----------------------------+
| track_promote_to                | production                  |
| track                           | alpha                       |
| version_code                    | 10303027                    |
| skip_upload_metadata            | false                       |
| skip_upload_images              | false                       |
| skip_upload_screenshots         | false                       |
| skip_upload_changelogs          | false                       |
| package_name                    | com.redacted.app          |
| release_status                  | completed                   |
| metadata_path                   | ./fastlane/metadata/android |
| json_key                        | release-key.json            |
| skip_upload_apk                 | false                       |
| skip_upload_aab                 | false                       |
| validate_only                   | false                       |
| check_superseded_tracks         | false                       |
| timeout                         | 300                         |
| deactivate_on_promote           | true                        |
| ack_bundle_installation_warning | false                       |
+---------------------------------+-----------------------------+
[10:48:10]: Preparing to upload for language 'en-GB'...
[10:48:11]: Uploading image file ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/featureGraphic.png...
[10:48:13]: Uploading image file ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/icon.png...
[10:48:16]: Uploading screenshot ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/phoneScreenshots/1_en-GB.png...
[10:48:18]: Uploading screenshot ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/phoneScreenshots/2_en-GB.png...
[10:48:21]: Uploading screenshot ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/phoneScreenshots/3_en-GB.png...
[10:48:24]: Uploading screenshot ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/phoneScreenshots/4_en-GB.png...
[10:48:27]: Uploading screenshot ./fastlane/metadata/android/en-GB/images/phoneScreenshots/5_en-GB.png...
[10:48:29]: Updating changelog for '10303027' and language 'en-GB'...
[10:48:29]: Uploading all changes to Google Play...
[10:48:31]: Successfully finished the upload to Google Play
### Environment
ðŸš« fastlane environment ðŸš« ### Stack | Key | Value | | --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | | OS | 11.2 | | Ruby | 2.7.2 | | Bundler? | true | | Git | git version 2.24.3 (Apple Git-128) | | Installation Source | ~/.rbenv/versions/2.7.2/bin/fastlane | | Host | macOS 11.2 (20D64) | | Ruby Lib Dir | ~/.rbenv/versions/2.7.2/lib | | OpenSSL Version | OpenSSL 1.1.1i 8 Dec 2020 | | Is contained | false | | Is homebrew | false | | Is installed via Fabric.app | false | | Xcode Path | /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/ | | Xcode Version | 12.4 | | Swift Version | 5.3.2 | ### System Locale | Variable | Value | | | -------- | ----------- | - | | LANG | en_GB.UTF-8 | âœ… | | LC_ALL | | | | LANGUAGE | | | ### fastlane files:
`./fastlane/Fastfile` ```ruby # This file contains the fastlane.tools configuration # You can find the documentation at https://docs.fastlane.tools # # For a list of all available actions, check out # # https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions # # For a list of all available plugins, check out # # https://docs.fastlane.tools/plugins/available-plugins # # Uncomment the line if you want fastlane to automatically update itself # update_fastlane default_platform(:android) def working_version version = JSON.parse(File.read('../../package.json'))['version'].split('.') major = version[0] minor = version[1] patch = version[2] { major: major.to_i, minor: minor.to_i, patch: patch.to_i } end def working_version_name working_version.values.join('.') end def track_version_code(track) # example: 10300006 #Â 1.0.0 abi 3 build 6 # example: 20312045 #Â 2.12.0 abi 3 build 45 code = google_play_track_version_codes(track: track).first.to_s UI.user_error!("Current version from Google Play not available") unless code major = code[0..-8] minor = code[-5..-4] abi = code[-6] build = code[-3..-1] { major: major.to_i, minor: minor.to_i, build: build.to_i } end def track_release_name(track, package) # egÂ 1.0.5 version = google_play_track_release_names(track: track, package_name: package).first.to_s UI.user_error!("Current version from Google Play not available") unless version parts = version.split('.') { major: parts[0].to_i, minor: parts[1].to_i, patch: parts[2].to_i } end def ci_tag_version_code version = ci_tag_version_name.split('.') { major: version[0].to_i, minor: version[1].to_i, patch: version[2].to_i } end def ci_tag_version_name ENV['CI_COMMIT_TAG'].chomp('-android') end def last_pipeline_version_code File.read('../PIPELINE_VERSION_CODE').to_i end def calculate_next_version_code(version) UI.message "Calculating version code to target: #{version.values.join('.')}" UI.message "Pulling existing version" track_version = track_version_code('internal') UI.message "Track version code: #{track_version.inspect}" version_less_than_track = track_version[:major] > version[:major] || track_version[:minor] > version[:minor] UI.user_error!("Next version #{version} less than track version #{track_version}") if version_less_than_track # bump build if version is the same same_version = track_version[:major] == version[:major] && track_version[:minor] == version[:minor] build = same_version ? track_version[:build] + 1 : 1 # work out the version code major = version[:major] * 10000000 minor = version[:minor] * 1000 code = major + minor + build UI.user_error!("Version code #{code} not 8 digits") if code.size != 8 code end def next_staging_version_name next_staging_version.values.join('.') end def next_staging_version #Â get latest prod version so we bump staging prod_version = track_release_name('internal', 'com.redacted.app') { major: prod_version[:major].to_i, minor: prod_version[:minor].to_i, patch: prod_version[:patch].to_i + 1 } end platform :android do desc "Runs all the tests" lane :test do gradle(task: "test") end def build_clean UI.message "\n\nCleaning project build" gradle(task: "clean") end def build_set_version_code(version) next_version_code = calculate_next_version_code(version) UI.message "\n\nSetting version code to #{next_version_code}" increment_version_code( app_project_dir: 'app', version_code: next_version_code ) # save version for pipeline artifacts next_version_code += + 4 * 100000 # add arm64-v8a abi code this is what google uses in the play store File.write('../PIPELINE_VERSION_CODE', next_version_code) end def build_set_version_name(next_version_name) UI.message "\n\nSetting version name to #{next_version_name}" set_value_in_build( app_project_dir: 'app', key: 'versionName', value: next_version_name ) File.write('../PIPELINE_VERSION_NAME', next_version_name) end def build_set_package_suffix(suffix) UI.message "\n\nSetting app identifier to: com.redacted.app.#{suffix}" set_value_in_build( app_project_dir: 'app', key: 'applicationIdSuffix', value: suffix ) end def build_staging_badge version = get_version_name(app_project_dir: 'app') add_badge( shield: "staging-#{version}-orange", alpha_channel: true, custom: '../staging-badge.png', glob: "./android/app/src/main/res/mipmap-*/ic_launcher.png", ) add_badge( shield: "staging-#{version}-orange", alpha_channel: true, custom: '../staging-badge.png', glob: "./android/app/src/main/res/mipmap-*/ic_launcher_round.png", ) add_badge( shield: "staging-#{version}-orange", alpha_channel: true, custom: '../staging-badge.png', glob: "./android/app/src/main/res/mipmap-*/ic_launcher_foreground.png", ) end def build_package UI.message "\n\nBuilding release bundle" gradle( task: 'bundle', build_type: 'Release', properties: { "org.gradle.jvmargs" => "Xmx2048m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8", "android.enableJetifier" => "true", "android.useAndroidX" => "true", "android.injected.signing.store.file" => 'release.keystore', "android.injected.signing.store.password" => ENV['GOOGLE_PLAY_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD'], "android.injected.signing.key.alias" => ENV['GOOGLE_PLAY_KEY_ALIAS'], "android.injected.signing.key.password" => ENV['GOOGLE_PLAY_KEY_PASSWORD'], } ) end def build_upload(track:, package:) UI.message "\n\nUploading to play store using '#{track}' track" upload_to_play_store( track: track, package_name: package, skip_upload_apk: true, skip_upload_metadata: false, skip_upload_images: false, skip_upload_screenshots: false, skip_upload_changelogs: false, aab: 'app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab', release_status: 'completed' ) end def build_promote(version_code:, from:, to:) UI.message "\n\Promoting #{from} to #{to}" upload_to_play_store( track_promote_to: to, track: from, version_code: version_code, skip_upload_metadata: false, skip_upload_images: false, skip_upload_screenshots: false, skip_upload_changelogs: false ) end def set_metadata_title(title) file = File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), 'metadata', 'android', 'en-GB', 'title.txt') File.write(file, title) end desc "Set version for development" lane :set_development_version do |options| UI.user_error!("Don't run this on CI, versioning is handled automatically") if ENV['CI_JOB_ID']&.empty? build_set_package_suffix(options[:bundle_suffix] || ENV['ANDROID_DEVELOPMENT_APP_PACKAGE_SUFFIX'] || '') build_set_version_code(next_staging_version) build_set_version_name(next_staging_version_name) end desc "Submit a new Staging Build to internal track" lane :staging_build do package_name = CredentialsManager::AppfileConfig.try_fetch_value(:package_name) UI.message("\n\nBuilding package: #{package_name}") build_clean build_set_package_suffix(ENV['ANDROID_STAGING_APP_PACKAGE_SUFFIX'] || '') build_set_version_code(next_staging_version) build_set_version_name(next_staging_version_name) build_staging_badge build_package end lane :staging_deploy do package_name = CredentialsManager::AppfileConfig.try_fetch_value(:package_name) UI.message("\n\Deploying package: #{package_name}") set_metadata_title('Redacted Staging') build_upload(track: 'internal', package: package_name) end lane :production_build do package_name = CredentialsManager::AppfileConfig.try_fetch_value(:package_name) UI.message("\n\nBuilding package: #{package_name}") build_clean build_set_package_suffix(ENV['ANDROID_PRODUCTION_APP_PACKAGE_SUFFIX'] || '') build_set_version_code(ci_tag_version_code) build_set_version_name(ci_tag_version_name) build_package end lane :production_deploy do package_name = CredentialsManager::AppfileConfig.try_fetch_value(:package_name) UI.message("\n\nDeploying package: #{package_name}") set_metadata_title('Redacted') build_upload(track: 'internal', package: package_name) version_code = last_pipeline_version_code # immediately promote to alpha build_promote(version_code: version_code, from: 'internal', to: 'alpha') end lane :production_promote do # promote alpha to production version_code = last_pipeline_version_code set_metadata_title('Redacted') build_promote(version_code: version_code, from: 'alpha', to: 'production') end end ```
`./fastlane/Appfile` ```ruby json_key_file("release-key.json") # Path to the json secret file - Follow https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions/supply/#setup to get one package_name("com.redacted.app") # e.g. com.krausefx.app for_lane :staging_build do package_name('com.redacted.app.stage') end for_lane :staging_deploy do package_name('com.redacted.app.stage') end ```
